divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from Niagara Falls, from the street which is Niagara Parkway, then turned down Glendale Ave. Observed the object before Glendale in the sky off in the distance, a very distinctive bright white lights. It affected the radio, or cd player anyway. It proceeded a straight path over the car as I turned down Glendale, the object was heading towards Niagara Falls. Then when the object got over us and past us on the other side of the car, it either simply disappeared, or somehow shadowed itself so it wouldn't be seen. At first I thought it was a jet. When the object affected the Cd, my wife was mad that her cd the one that never skips, was skipping now. We both saw it but we didn't have any bad feelings about it. I lost sight of it because I think it either flew fast towards Niagara Falls, or it just simply disappeared.
Summary: A Triangle Shape With Bright White Lights
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in St Catharines
There were no other sightings in St Catharines on or around July 14th 2012
